profile:
Sofalvi is a family owned and operated business, specializing in both commercial and residential overhead door sale, installation and repair. We proudly service the London and surrounding area with the best products and services available in the industry. 

At Sofalvi, you will undoubtedly find the perfect addition to your home. As a certified Garaga expert and authorized LiftMaster dealer, we are committed to providing our customers with quality, aesthetic and durability. Our wide selection of color, material and window will enhance the elegance and style of your home, and our expert technicians will assure a safe and hassle-free procedure. 

Whether you need to replace an existing door or are looking for a door for a new construction project, we have the products, skills and competitive pricing you are looking for. If you have an existing garage door that needs service, our highly-trained and experienced technicians will provide fast, quality work. 

Thank you for considering Sofalvi for your project, we look forward to welcoming you in our showroom and store. 


Margaret Schwager and Andy Balazs
Owners
Sofalvi Door Systems
hours: Monday to Thursday from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Friday from 8:00 AM to 4:30 PM.
